text: The women's 4x100 metres relay event at the 1992 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Seoul, Korea, at Olympic Stadium on 19 and 20 September. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Gillian Russell Merlene Frazer Michelle Christie Nikole Mitchell ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Benita Kelley Zundra Feagin Lesa Parker Marion Jones ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Katja Seidel Gabi Rockmeier Birgit Rockmeier Silke Lichtenhagen ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 20 September {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! title: 1992 World Junior Championships in Athletics – Women's 4 × 100 metres relay
